ti:translation.ti:label: Whether vice be sufficient to cause unhappiness
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Moralia, Vol. 6. Helmbold, William Clark, translator. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press; London: William Heinemann Ltd., 1939 (printing).

ti:translation.ti:label: Whether vice is sufficient to render a man unhappy
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. 4. Goodwin, William W., editor; White, Samuel, translator. Boston: Little, Brown, and Company; Cambridge: Press of John Wilson and Son, 1874.

ti:edition.ti:label: Εἰ αὐτάρκης ἡ κακία πρὸς κακοδαιμονίαν
ti:edition.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarchi Chaeronensis Moralia, Vol 3. Vernardakēs, Grēgorios N., editor. Leipzig: Teubner, 1891.
